nodes.text: Star Wars: Smuggler's Run (German: Im Auftrag der Rebellion) is a four-part comic story that was written by Alec Worley, illustrated by Ingo Römling, and adapted from the novel of the same name, by Greg Rucka.

It was first published by Panini Verlag in issues 1–4 of the monthly magazine Star Wars Universe. An English-language version was later published as the two-part comic book miniseries Star Wars Adventures: Smuggler's Run.
